title: 所有玩家和OP都无法用指令
txt_content:
我弄玩家进服称号，就修改了/plugins/GroupManager/worlds/world/ 这里面的文件，然后不知怎么的，OP无法使用/spawn 和/warp 连/tp 别人的权限都没了，玩家在哪都不可以破坏方块   ，以下是指令，急求啊                                                       # Group inheritance#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'


groups:
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&4[城管]'
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&c[腐竹]'
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build :true
      prefix: '&a[居民]'
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&b[OP]&4'
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - MyPet.keep.
    - MyPet.release.
    - MyPet.release.Eadman
    - MyPet.release.Endman
    - MyPet.release.Pig
    - MyPet.user.leash.
    - MyPet.user.leash.Endman
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&e[未验证]'
      suffix: ''
